column1: The purpose of this data set was to compile daily sales and number of customers information for Rossmann’s 1115 stores located across the Europe
and see what patterns arise when variables such as competition and promotion are considered against the sales or the number of customers each store had for a that particular day.
We were interest in seeing what variables have the positive of negative effect in changing sales or number of customers,
and measuring correlation coefficient/r^2 values to see how big of an impact each variable has on the sales and the number of customers.

column2: 1115 different stores spread around the European area.
There are four types of stores and we assumed that these fall under Remedies, Beauty, Foods, and House. These stores focus more on providing these products.
Distance between a closest competition store.
Month in a single year when the competition store opened.
Year that the competition store opened
Year number/Month number of since competition opened
Whether the store holds promotion type 2 or not.
1115 different stores spread around the European area.

column5: Mon, Tues, Weds, Thurs, Fri, Sat, Sun

column2: Number of customers of the day
